entry.def: Brushed cotton, nylon, or other fabric feels soft and furry.

means.word_mean: 1. touched lightly in passing; grazed against;

sentences.sentence: "of all the people brushed against in a normal day on a city street I remember not a one"

means.word_mean: 2. (of hair or clothing) groomed with a brush;

sentences.sentence: "the freshly brushed clothes hung in the closet"

means.word_mean: 3. (of fabrics) having soft nap produced by brushing;
